headline: BofA Raises Price Target on Datadog (DDOG)  to $150 Amid Strong AI Momentum
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the 10 AI Stocks in the Spotlight. On June 18, BofA analyst Koji Ikeda raised the firm’s price target on the stock to $150 from $138 and kept a “Buy” rating on the shares. The firm has termed Datadog as a “top pick” for the second half of 2025, backed by […]

headline: Snowflake Deepens AI Integration: Is the Growth Thesis Strengthening?
summary: With Cortex Gen2 and Openflow, SNOW deepens AI reach and gains traction with partners like Canva and Acxiom.
